text: Andhra Pradesh Auto Rickshaw Drivers and Workers Federation or Andhra Pradesh Auto Drivers and Workers' Federation is a trade union of auto rickshaw drivers in Andhra Pradesh, India. APARDWF is affiliated to the All India Trade Union Congress. ==See also== * Rickshaw ==References== Category:All India Trade Union Congress Category:Road transport trade unions Category:Trade unions in Andhra Pradesh Category:Rickshaws Category:Transport trade unions in India
title: Andhra Pradesh Auto Rickshaw Drivers and Workers Federation
